description: Gets a LaunchConfiguration, filtered by Source Server IDs.

parameters.name: sourceServerID
parameters.description: The ID of the Source Server that we want to retrieve a Launch Configuration for.

nested_items.name: copyPrivateIp
nested_items.description: Whether we should copy the Private IP of the Source Server to the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: copyTags
nested_items.description: Whether we want to copy the tags of the Source Server to the EC2 machine of the Recovery Instance.

nested_items.name: ec2LaunchTemplateID
nested_items.description: The EC2 launch template ID of this launch configuration.

nested_items.name: launchDisposition
nested_items.description: The state of the Recovery Instance in EC2 after the recovery operation.

nested_items.name: launchIntoEC2InstanceID
nested_items.description: Optionally holds EC2 instance ID of an instance to launch into, instead of launching a new instance during drill, recovery or failback.

nested_items.name: licensing
nested_items.description: The licensing configuration to be used for this launch configuration.

nested_items.name: osByol
nested_items.description: Whether to enable 'Bring your own license' or not.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the launch configuration.

nested_items.name: postLaunchEnabled
nested_items.description: Whether we want to activate post-launch actions for the Source Server.

nested_items.name: sourceServerID
nested_items.description: The ID of the Source Server for this launch configuration.

nested_items.name: targetInstanceTypeRightSizingMethod
nested_items.description: Whether Elastic Disaster Recovery should try to automatically choose the instance type that best matches the OS, CPU, and RAM of your Source Server.
